review: So terribly disappointed with this product. First complaint, it did not work on the tv I originally purchased it for. It simply wouldn't boot. So it seems this thing is no where near as universal as say a roku or chromecast (both of which I have, use, and love). Big deal breaker there. Once I found a tv in my house it was compatible with, the navigation is on par with an android tablet with 3 or 4 years of use on it. I mean PAINFUL. 15+ seconds to switch menu screens? Seriously, felt like I was using a Pentium 2 windows laptop. Please introduce a no star option Amazon, for products like this.
